title: Chili by George
tagline: Reliable weeknight chili. Stovetop or slow cooker.
description: Reliable weeknight chili. Stovetop or slow cooker. Serves 10.
steps: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat until no pink remains, about 8 minutes. Drain the fat.
Transfer beef to a large pot. Add tomato juice, tomato sauce, both beans, onion, bell pepper, and all spices. Stir to combine.
Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce to low and simmer uncovered for 1½ hours, stirring occasionally, until thickened.
Taste and adjust salt. Serve with your preferred toppings.
notes: Slow cooker: Brown beef first, then combine everything on low for 8–10 hours.
Too thin? Swap tomato juice for crushed tomatoes, or simmer uncovered longer.
Storage: Keeps 5 days refrigerated. Freezes well for 3 months.
